column1: Report title: Homicide Trends in United States
Authors: Erica Smith and Alexia Cooper
Table 11. Homicides by intimate relationship and  type of weapon, 1980-2008
Note: Percentages are based on the 63.1% of homicides from 1980 through 2008 for which the victim/offender relationships were known. See section on intimate partner violence.
